title: OFFBOARD: support angular velocity targets (?)
body:
Hello devs,
With the cleanup for `OFFBOARD` attitude control, is there scope for handling angular velocity setpoints? I am assuming that `vehicle_rates_setpoint_s` corresponds to Euler angle rates in [L1614 at `mavlink_receiver.cpp`](https://github.com/PX4/PX4-Autopilot/blob/77a37c26bf7696d6ce8658a94339e3e28de340c4/src/modules/mavlink/mavlink_receiver.cpp#L1614). It is possible to handle the conversion from target angular velocity to target angle-rates on the sender side, but I was curious if there is interest to support this in PX4.


#### Maybe Bug?
Not sure if this is related to `OFFBOARD`, but, it is also unclear to me why `vehicle_rates_setpoint` is used to update [`_angular_velocity_sp` in L178 at AngularVelocityController.cpp](https://github.com/PX4/PX4-Autopilot/blob/6135bb384b5189deef0dd48245b31881ae26915a/src/modules/angular_velocity_controller/AngularVelocityController.cpp#L178). Is this simply an overload?


Thanks in advance.
